stork.feather

Class Bell.ThenAs<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.Bell<V>
      • stork.feather.Bell.ThenAs<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the supertype of objects this bell rings with.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bell.Then
    Enclosing class:
    Bell<T>

    public class Bell.ThenAs<V>
extends Bell<V>
    A bell which will perform some operation after the parent bell rings. When the parent bell rings, this bell's then(...) methods will be called depending on the result of the parent bell. By default, the then(...) methods will ring this bell, though these may be overridden to start another operation which will ring this bell instead. This can be used to create an asynchronous chain of commands.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class stork.feather.Bell

        Bell.All<V>, Bell.And, Bell.Any<V>, Bell.MultiBell<I>, Bell.Or, Bell.Promise, Bell.PromiseAs<V>, Bell.Then, Bell.ThenAs<V>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bell.ThenAs()
      Create a ThenAs bell which will ring with null if then(T) is not overridden.
      Bell.ThenAs(V done)
      Create a ThenAs bell which will ring with done if then(T) is not overridden.
      Bell.ThenAs(V done, V fail)
      Create a ThenAs bell which will ring with done if then(T) is not overridden, and fail if then(Throwable) is not overridden.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void then()
      This method will always be executed after the parent bell rings.
      protected void then(T done)
      This method will be called if the parent bell rings successfully.
      protected void then(Throwable fail)
      This method will be called if the parent bell rings successfully.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bell.ThenAs

        public Bell.ThenAs()
        Create a ThenAs bell which will ring with null if then(T) is not overridden.

      • Bell.ThenAs

        public Bell.ThenAs(V done)
        Create a ThenAs bell which will ring with done if then(T) is not overridden.
        Parameters:
        done - the default value to ring this bell with if done(T) is not overridden.

      • Bell.ThenAs

        public Bell.ThenAs(V done,
           V fail)
        Create a ThenAs bell which will ring with done if then(T) is not overridden, and fail if then(Throwable) is not overridden.
        Parameters:
        done - the default value to ring this bell with if done(T) is not overridden.
        fail - the default value to ring this bell with if done(Throwable) is not overridden.

    • Method Detail

      • then

        protected void then(T done)
        This method will be called if the parent bell rings successfully. By default, this method rings this bell with whatever was passed in for done in the contructor, or null if the empty contructor was used.
        Parameters:
        done - the value the parent bell rang with.

      • then

        protected void then(Throwable fail)
        This method will be called if the parent bell rings successfully. By default, this method rings this bell with the Throwable fail passed to this method, or whatever was passed in for fail in the contructor if that constructor was used.
        Parameters:
        fail - the Throwable the parent bell failed with.

      • then

        protected void then()
        This method will always be executed after the parent bell rings. By default, it does nothing.
